metadata.Title: CVE-2022-25315 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Expat (aka libexpat) before 2.4.5, there is an integer overflow in storeRawNames.

notes.Note: sbeattie> paraview uses system expat xotcl uses system expat poco uses system expat gdcm uses system expat audacity uses system expat simgear uses system expat coin3 uses system expat as of 4.0.0~CMake~6f54f1602475+ds1-1 sitecopy uses system expat since 1:0.16.0-1 (dapper!) rodrigo-zaiden> libxmltok does not include storeRawNames method, so, it is not affected.
